metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5225 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
LibTIFF version 4.0.7 is vulnerable to a heap buffer overflow in the tools/tiffcp resulting in DoS or code execution via a crafted BitsPerSample value.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5225` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1').
